name: get_anime_by_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool anime_manga_and_novels_api.
Tool description: Get the complete data of 14k Novels, 1k animes and 1k mangas.
we updated our data daily

API description: Retrieves detailed information about an anime given its unique identifier using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

is_id.description: The unique identifier of the anime.
